title: Thailand: past and present
creator_credit: Unicorn Productions and Coronet Instructional Media
brief_description: Land of Buddha, marbled temples and sampan crowded rivers, Thailand is the biggest exporter of rice in the world. From isolated hill tribes of the north to rice-paddy farmers, boatmen of the klongs and merchants of modern Bangkok, we meet the Thai people, preserving traditions in a changing world.
